subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Despite all the childhood sacrifices and adult setbacks, Tommy Haas has never lost his passion for the game. Competing at his 14th at Wimbledon, he is seeded No. 13, which he has long considered his lucky number.
snippet: Despite all the childhood sacrifices and adult setbacks, Tommy Haas has never lost his passion for the game. Competing at his 14th at Wimbledon, he is seeded No. 13, which he has long considered his lucky number.
